org.gatein.api.site

Class SiteQuery.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gatein.api.site.SiteQuery.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    SiteQuery

    public static class SiteQuery.Builder
extends Object
    The builder class responsible for building SiteQuery objects.
    See Also:
    SiteQuery

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_LIMIT
      The default limit used for pagination
      static Pagination DEFAULT_PAGINATION
      The default pagination used for SiteQuery's with a limit set to DEFAULT_LIMIT
      static SiteType DEFAULT_SITE_TYPE
      Default site type used to build SiteQuery's if one is not defined.

      Constructor and Description
      SiteQuery.Builder()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Creates a new SiteQuery object represented by the state this builder
